mapper.select: SELECT ai.*, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT t.type ORDER BY t.id) AS kinds, v.*,v.video_id AS lookVideoId,u.score AS userScore,u.id AS ratingId FROM anime_index ai LEFT JOIN hua_anime_type ht ON ai.id = ht.anime_id LEFT JOIN hua_type t ON ht.type_id = t.id LEFT JOIN video_record_latest v ON ai.id = v.anime_id and v.user_id = #{userId} LEFT JOIN user_rating u ON ai.id = u.anime_id and u.user_id = #{userId} WHERE ai.id = #{id} GROUP BY ai.id,v.id,u.id;
